con:call.name: ModifyBranding Request
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sws="http://stamps.com/xml/namespace/2021/01/swsim/SwsimV111">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <sws:ModifyBranding>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Authenticator>?</sws:Authenticator>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Credentials>\r <sws:IntegrationID>?</sws:IntegrationID>\r <sws:Username>?</sws:Username>\r <sws:Password>?</sws:Password>\r </sws:Credentials>\r <sws:Branding>\r <sws:BrandingId>?</sws:BrandingId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:BrandingProperties>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ReturnPolicy/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Email/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Phone/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:LogoTargetUrl/>\r <sws:BrandName>?</sws:BrandName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:LogoUrl/>\r <sws:LogoType>?</sws:LogoType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:MenuLinks>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <sws:MenuLink>\r <sws:Url>?</sws:Url>\r <sws:Text>?</sws:Text>\r </sws:MenuLink>\r </sws:MenuLinks>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:SocialMedia>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <sws:SocialMedia>\r <sws:Type>?</sws:Type>\r <sws:Url>?</sws:Url>\r </sws:SocialMedia>\r </sws:SocialMedia>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Toggles>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ShowLogo>?</sws:ShowLogo>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ShowCustomColors>?</sws:ShowCustomColors>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ShowSocialMedia>?</sws:ShowSocialMedia>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ShowStoreUrl>?</sws:ShowStoreUrl>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ShowMenuLinks>?</sws:ShowMenuLinks>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ShowReturnPolicy>?</sws:ShowReturnPolicy>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ShowEmail>?</sws:ShowEmail>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ShowPhone>?</sws:ShowPhone>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ShowShipmentDetails>?</sws:ShowShipmentDetails>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ShowItemImages>?</sws:ShowItemImages>\r </sws:Toggles>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Colors>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Primary/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Secondary/>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Tertiary/>\r </sws:Colors>\r <sws:Theme>?</sws:Theme>\r </sws:BrandingProperties>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Reference>?</sws:Reference>\r </sws:Branding>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:SetAsDefault>false</sws:SetAsDefault>\r </sws:ModifyBranding>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
